text: Megan Thomas sat tight-lipped, nursing the sleeping Cadwallader. Driver and conductor peered ahead into nothingness. On the back seat Stan Hayball embraced his Eth. Morfydd thought of Dai. The Rev. Edwards, standing at the front, looked at his forlorn flock. "What about a verse or two of Cwm Rhondda?" he suggested hopefully.
